content: {"version":2,"machineId":"4a6b37ca-0d18-4f58-8ab3-f020a844114e","content":"{\"windows\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaults\\n[\\n\\n    {\\n    \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+w\\\",\\\"command\\\": \\\"expand_region\\\", \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus\\\"\\n},\\n{\\n    \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+w\\\",\\\"command\\\": \\\"undo_expand_region\\\", \\\"when\\\": \\\"editorTextFocus && editorHasSelection\\\"\\n},\\n{\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+a\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"editor.emmet.action.balanceOut\\\"\\n    }\\n\\n]\",\"linux\":\"[]\"}"}
